description: Some guys just need to be disciplined and Kelvin Summers fits that bill perfectly! Our crew member Sebastian takes this bad boy in hand and spanks his cute butt until it's red, raw and stinging. Once the poor boy can't take any more, our crew member demands that Kelvin sits in front of him and performs a solo wank which only serves to humiliate the cute teen even more.
title: Kelvin Summers & Sebastian Kane
